00026   namespace WindowFunction {
00028     template<typename T>
00029     struct Rectangular {
00030       Rectangular(size_t) {}
00031       T operator()(size_t) const { return T(1); }
00032     } ;
00034     template<typename T>
00035     class Hanning {
00036     public:
00037       Hanning(size_t n)
00038         : norm_(1./double(n-1)) {}
00039       T operator()(size_t u) const { 
00040         return 0.5*(1.0-std::cos(2.*M_PI*u*norm_));
00041       }
00042     private:
00043       const double norm_;
00044     } ;
00046     template<typename T>
00047     class Hamming {
00048     public:
00049       Hamming(size_t n)
00050         : norm_(1./double(n-1)) {}
00051       T operator()(size_t u) const { 
00052         return 0.54 - 0.46*std::cos(2.*M_PI*u*norm_);
00053       }
00054     private:
00055       const double norm_;
00056     } ;
00058     template<typename T>
00059     class Gaussian {
00060     public:
00061       Gaussian(size_t n, T sigma)
00062         : n_(n)
00063         , norm_(1./(0.5*sigma*(n-1))) {}
00064       T operator()(size_t u) const { 
00065         return std::exp(-0.5*std::pow((u-0.5*(n_-1))*norm_, 2));
00066       }
00067     private:
00068       const size_t n_;
00069       const double norm_;
00070     } ;
00072     template<typename T>
00073     class Blackman {
00074     public:
00075       Blackman(size_t n, T alpha=0.16)
00076         : a0_(0.5*(1-alpha))
00077         , a1_(0.5)
00078         , a2_(0.5*alpha)
00079         , norm_(1./double(n-1)) {}
00080       T operator()(size_t u) const { 
00081         const T t(2.*M_PI*u*norm_);
00082         return a0_ - a1_*std::cos(t) + a2_*std::cos(2*t);
00083       }
00084     private:
00085       const T a0_, a1_, a2_;
00086       const double norm_;
00087     } ;
00088   } // namespace WindowFunction

00090   namespace Internal {
00091     template<typename>
00092     struct FFTWTraits ;
00093 
00094 #define MAKE_TRAITS(P, T)                                               \
00095     template<>                                                          \
00096     struct FFTWTraits<T> {                                              \
00097       typedef FFTW_CONCAT(P,_complex) complex_type;                     \
00098       typedef FFTW_CONCAT(P,_plan) Plan;                                \
00099                                                                         \
00100       static complex_type* malloc(size_t n) {                           \
00101         return (complex_type*)FFTW_CONCAT(P,_malloc)(sizeof(complex_type)*n); \
00102       }                                                                 \
00103       static void free(complex_type* a) { FFTW_CONCAT(P,_free)(a); }    \
00104       static Plan plan_dft_1d(size_t n, complex_type* in, complex_type* out, \
00105                               int sign, unsigned flags) {               \
00106         return FFTW_CONCAT(P,_plan_dft_1d)(n, in, out, sign, flags);    \
00107       }                                                                 \
00108       static void execute(Plan p) {                                     \
00109         FFTW_CONCAT(P,_execute)(p);                                     \
00110       }                                                                 \
00111       static void destroy_plan(Plan p) {                                \
00112         FFTW_CONCAT(P,_destroy_plan)(p);                                \
00113       }                                                                 \
00114     }
00115 
00116     MAKE_TRAITS(fftwf, float);
00117     MAKE_TRAITS(fftw,  double);
00118     MAKE_TRAITS(fftwl, long double);

00120     template<typename T>
00121     class FFTWArray {
00122     public:
00123       typedef Internal::FFTWTraits<T> Traits;
00124       typedef typename Traits::complex_type complex_type;
00125 
00126       FFTWArray(size_t n)
00127         : n_(n)
00128         , a_(Traits::malloc(n))
00129         , norm_(n_) {}
00130       
00131       template<typename WINDOW_FCN>
00132       FFTWArray(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& v,
00133                 const WINDOW_FCN& window_fcn)
00134         : n_(v.size())
00135         , a_(Traits::malloc(n_))
00136         , norm_(fill(v, window_fcn)) {}
00137       
00138       ~FFTWArray() { Traits::free(a_); }
00139       
00140       size_t size() const { return n_; }
00141       T norm() const { return norm_; }
00142       
00143       complex_type* begin() { return a_; }
00144       complex_type* end()   { return a_+n_; }  
00145       complex_type&       operator[](size_t n)       { return a_[n]; }
00146       const complex_type& operator[](size_t n) const { return a_[n]; }
00147       
00148       template<typename V,
00149                template<typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00150       double fill(const std::vector<std::complex<V> >& v,
00151                   const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00152         return fill(v.begin(), v.end(), window_fcn);
00153       }
00154       template<typename V,
00155                template<typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00156       double fill(typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i0,
00157                   typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i1,
00158                   const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00159         const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00160         if (length != n_) resize(length);
00161         norm_= 0;
00162 #if 1
00163         for (unsigned u(0); u<n_ /* && i0 != i1 */; ++u, ++i0) {
00164           const T w(window_fcn(u));
00165           norm_ += w;
00166           a_[u][0] = w * i0->real();
00167           a_[u][1] = w * i0->imag();
00168         }
00169 #endif
00170         return norm_;
00171       }
00172       
00173       void resize(size_t n) {
00174         if (n != n_) {
00175           Traits::free(a_); 
00176           n_= n;
00177           a_= Traits::malloc(n);
00178         }
00179       }
00180     private:
00181       size_t n_;
00182       complex_type *a_;
00183       T norm_;
00184     } ;
00185   } // namespace Internal

00188   template<typename T>
00189   class FFTWTransform : public Internal::FFTWTraits<T> {
00190   public:    
00191     typedef Internal::FFTWTraits<T> Traits;
00192     typedef typename Traits::complex_type complex_type;
00193     typedef typename Traits::Plan Plan;
00194     
00195     using Traits::plan_dft_1d;
00196     using Traits::execute;
00197     using Traits::destroy_plan;
00198 
00199     FFTWTransform(size_t n, int sign, unsigned flags)
00200       : in_(n)
00201       , out_(n)
00202       , sign_(sign)
00203       , flags_(flags)
00204       , plan_(plan_dft_1d(n, in_.begin(), out_.begin(), sign, flags))
00205       , normalizationFactor_(T(1)/in_.norm()) {}    
00206     
00207     template<typename WINDOW_FCN>
00208     FFTWTransform(const std::vector<std::complex<double> >& v,
00209                   const WINDOW_FCN& window_fcn,
00210                   int sign, 
00211                   unsigned flags)
00212       : in_(v, window_fcn)
00213       , out_(v.size())
00214       , sign_(sign)
00215       , flags_(flags)
00216       , plan_(plan_dft_1d(in_.size(), in_.begin(), out_.begin(), sign, flags))
00217       , normalizationFactor_(T(1)/in_.norm()) { 
00218       execute(plan_);
00219     }    
00220     ~FFTWTransform() {
00221       destroy_plan(plan_);
00222     }
00223 
00225     void resize(size_t n) {
00226       if (n != size()) {
00227         in_.resize(n);
00228         out_.resize(n);
00229         destroy_plan(plan_);
00230         plan_ = plan_dft_1d(in_.size(), in_.begin(), out_.begin(), sign_, flags_);
00231         // normalizationFactor_ has to be updated by hand
00232       }
00233     }
00234 
00236     double normWindow() const { return in_.size() * normalizationFactor_; }
00237 
00239     template<typename V,
00240              template <typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00241     void transformVector(const std::vector<std::complex<V> >& v,
00242                          const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00243       transformRange(v.begin(), v.end(), window_fcn);
00244     }
00246     template<typename V,
00247              template <typename U> class WINDOW_FCN>
00248     void transformRange(typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i0,
00249                         typename std::vector<std::complex<V> >::const_iterator i1,
00250                         const WINDOW_FCN<V>& window_fcn) {
00251       const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00252       if (length != size())
00253         resize(length);
00254       in_.fill(i0, i1, window_fcn);
00255       normalizationFactor_= T(1)/in_.norm();
00256       execute(plan_);
00257     }
00259     void transform() {
00260       normalizationFactor_= 1;
00261       execute(plan_);
00262     }
00263 
00265     size_t size() const { return in_.size(); }
00266     
00269     std::complex<T> getBin(size_t u) const {
00270       return normalizationFactor_*std::complex<T>(out_[u][0], out_[u][1]); 
00271     }
00273     std::vector<complex_type> getBins() const {
00274       std::vector<complex_type> v(size());
00275       for (size_t u(0); u<size(); ++u) 
00276         v[u] = getBin(u);
00277       return v;
00278     }
00279 
00281     std::complex<T> getInBin(size_t u) const { 
00282       return std::complex<T>(in_[u][0], in_[u][1]);
00283     }
00284 
00286     std::complex<T>& in (size_t index) { return reinterpret_cast<std::complex<T>&>(in_[index]); }
00288     std::complex<T>& out(size_t index) { return reinterpret_cast<std::complex<T>&>(out_[index]); }
00289 
00291     const std::complex<T>& in (size_t index) const { return reinterpret_cast<const std::complex<T>&>(in_[index]); }
00293     const std::complex<T>& out(size_t index) const { return reinterpret_cast<const std::complex<T>&>(out_[index]); }
00294 
00295   protected:
00296   private:

00298     Internal::FFTWArray<T> out_;  
00299     int                    sign_; 
00300     unsigned              flags_; 
00301     Plan                   plan_;

00303   } ;
